# Interactive Exam Builder Platform - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack web application for educators to create customized exam papers with drag-and-drop interface, LaTeX support, PDF export, and question bank management.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React.js with drag-and-drop (react-beautiful-dnd)
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **PDF Generation**: jsPDF with html2canvas
- **LaTeX**: MathJax for mathematical equations
- **Authentication**: JWT-based

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/frontend` - React application
- `/shared` - Shared types and utilities
